channel.title: Zanaris - Summoning/18+ Bosses/8 Dungeons/ Dungeoneering/Perfect Combat
channel.description:
Well as ramie quit RSPS i decided to release our work. This server can be ran for 4 weeks straight without restarting. All deadlocks are fixed, so are all dupes. Took a lot of shortcuts when coding this, it looks ugly but it still runs. This was a learning project and it developed into a big server. Most of the code looks horrid you can fix that up yourself.
Fully server sided clipped, detects fake cheat client objects.
Client: [url=http://uppit.com/v2pj9u5lnkg2/Zanaris_Client.rar]Download Zanaris.Client.rar @ UppIT[/url] Cache: [url=http://uppit.com/fz1j187shg5e/EstraniaV4.rar]Download EstraniaV4.rar @ UppIT[/url]
Mirror to all: http://www.mediafire.com/?952mp2ynfi9y5k4
Cache goes in your home folder like users/whateveruser/.SX_V7.0/
Server: [url=http://uppit.com/phgmqjm4u5qk/Estrania_Untouched.rar]Download Estrania.Untouched.rar @ UppIT[/url]
Media:
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/rwrw5v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2gslell.png[/img]
[ul][*]Shop [*]Dungeoneering [*]Summoning [*]70% of summoning specs work [*]Overloads [*]Most 634 Items have been added [*]Hit effects such as Divine reducing Damage [*]Rewards for fight pits enhance exp [*]Good eco [*]14+ Boss's [*]Clipped npcs and players [*]BoB summoning [*]Duel arena [*]Much more join now![/ul]
Pictures: [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/Ll05Jp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/w1qt93.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/33arzb5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/1rdvyv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/309lqoy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2rr14xu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2qamgwo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2ld87dk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/fz3t36.png[/img] [B]14+ Boss's[/B]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/313kp4g.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/zxkv0j.png[/img] [B]Maismic increases players attack delay[/B]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2hs0ntk.png[/img] [B]All chaotic shields working with effects [/B]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/xc80mu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/25h27ol.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/15579tk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/auavtj.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/e0qzy9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/35hny9j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2u63h53.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc448/max1so/client3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc448/max1so/client2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/t7og7t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/e0qzy9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2edrw5t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ptpb2w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2hoz5ur.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ik9spj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/118ki2r.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2mnpu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1220ndf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/24fib60.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/nvxlya.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/34yzn29.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2gxl403.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/eknok1.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“iBunnie, post:39, topic:455127”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=557999.msg4178280#msg4178280 date=1355227356]

Is this dspk? Was too lazy to pay attention to posts, just looked at it and instantly replied.
[/quote]I don’t think so. But it is even worse than DSPK. The server is horrible.

Any reasons?[/quote]

1- It doesn’t have netty implemented the correct way.
2- Did you seen the classes? They are way far to be ‘clean’
3- The client packing is horrible.
4- It does have features. But it will need a huge core cleanup.

Read full topic
